author: Amber Waters
comment: I like the look and the fact you can change the colors, but it gets stuck and stops changing time. Also, when you go to change its look, it just stays the same. So now I feel like I should uninstall this since it's not serving its purpose. I have Moto Z Play if that helps.

author: T Jagger
comment: Thanks for the great widget dev! I like it but the last update causes the time to freeze on the widget. I couldn't notice a pattern or replicate the issue but I'm sure it's an easy fix. (On an Honor 8 - UK)
title: Looks great but there's a big bug!

author: Richard Agnew
comment: This has instantly become one of my favorite widgets!  Becoming a fan of the developer,  keep up the great work. I would like to see the widget automatically change to match with the background. I have open the app for it to take this effect.
title: Awesome

author: Ben Moses
comment: The look and feel is amazing. But it's not serving the main purpose. The clock gets strucked at some time and we need to remove the widget again to get it back into correct time. Please work it out
title: Freezing at a point

author: audioflection
comment: The LWP and daydream are flawless in my opinion. All I need to say is that when setting up the daydream, to prevent screen burn in, turn the background to pitch black and make the inactive color to pitch black as well. You can tap the area of a number to see it.
title: No problems, no lag, nothing

author: Exalia Justice
comment: Lots of color combinations to make, and it's great! One thing: is there a seconds time for the widget? If you add the seconds time for the widget, that would be great! And will increase to a 5-star rating too! 😊
title: Cool-looking

author: cht jagadesh
comment: Either create a live wallpaper with just clock n rest being transparent OR make the widget fully animated , plus the custom wallpaper quality is being severely degraded. please fix .thank u.
title: One feature needed

author: Lawliet Matt Keehl
comment: But why are some numbers like 8 and the curved lines of others like 9 and 2 not smooth. They have these weird bumps on the widget. Is it supposed to be that way?
title: Really good

author: Bheemeshwar S V S
comment: The clock motions r very fluid except for one area, when the hours change from a double digit to a single digit. Try finding a way to make that transition more fluid.
title: Great app,suggestion added

author: Pamela Wallace
comment: This is a stylishly simple widget. I searched for hours to finstylishd a simple clock widget and this is exactly what I was looking for! I find myself staring at the design every time I unlock my phone. Thank you!
title: Wow

author: Wer123 123
comment: One major hassle with this app is the interface launches whenever I unlock my phone. Also can you add some option that I can share an image directly to this app to set it as the wallpaper in case of live wallpaper.

author: Deepesh Pancholi
comment: This is seriously cool! I've been looking for the io16 counter as a clock for a while now so it was nice stumbling upon this! There are a few inconsistencies. First of all, the custom backgrounds are heavily degraded and secondly, the backgrounds don't scroll (is it called parallax?) with swipes even when a larger size is used as a crop. In fact the crop looks even more degraded! But that's nothing that can't be fixed with an update! Best of luck, looking forward to bug fixes :)
title: Awesome but needs improvement

author: Ashish Verma
comment: The widget on my screen stops updating time after a while. Fix it in your next update please. Really love the widget.
title: Awesome widget, has few bugs.

author: devendra goswami
comment: very nice app. really appreciate your work. one thing i want you to add in app is - add something for screen when its locked. bcoz am getting bored with my regular locked screen.

author: Nicholas Savvides
comment: Great app.. but it's really laggy on both widgets and live wallpaper... using Nexus 6P..
title: Very laggy

author: asad ahmed
comment: A really cool take on customising your Android homescreen as the clock 🕒 widget gives a stunning neon like effect while being really clean and materialistic at the same time! Only wish u guys also included the ability to turn on second counter in the clock widget too.
title: Awesome app!

author: Alex Lee
comment: Beautiful clock, but app is still extremely laggy, also laggy when entering daydream.
title: Great but needs fixing

author: Megan Van Zuydam
comment: IT CRASHES EVERY 10 SECONDS! It really looks like a cute app but the crashing is getting a bit much.

author: eric chen
comment: Great widget and live wall. Beautiful animations but still some bugs, adding custom background didn't crop correctly the picture. I would also like to see an option with the date. Still great work nothing that can't update fix.
title: With a lot of potencial

author: Vatsal Balyan
comment: This app sometimes doesn't synchronize with my system clock...so I've to again and again click on the widget to refresh it...which is very irritating....I'm using ASUS ZenFone2 ze551ml so team please do have a look and do something please....

author: Walter CCH
comment: My watch face run very good now. But still very laggy...
title: Thanks for fixes!

author: Harsh Bhandari
comment: Lot of battery drain while using live wallpaper. 5% in approx 1 hour. Otherwise great app.

author: TonGi018
comment: I absolutely love the clock widget on my homescreen but it would be nice if there was a drop shadow option in the settings to better differentiate the (color adapting) font from the background. I know there's an 'outline' option but I'd much prefer a nice drop shadow.
title: Great app but it needs one more feature

author: Ominasiac Films
comment: I just got my my new phone a few days ago and I was excited because of the android software, especially sincebive been using an s4 for a while with KitKat. Anyway, this definately changes the way my phone looks in a really good way.
title: Well This Looks Fancy

author: Felix Ulmanu
comment: The preset colours work amazing with almost any wallpaper, and it really goes well with my Nova Launcher setup. There should be more of these kinds of useful tweaks on the play store
title: You know you want to get it

author: Jacob Grimes
comment: It's almost microscopic it's about one block wide and just looks like 4 balls of colors. If I change the colors the balls change too but it is coming in way too small. Would love to run it though.
title: Looks cool but when I apply the widget on my LG V10...

author: Shreyam Taneja
comment: Pls add a feature where we can choose the background for the live wallpaper from a wallpaper picker instead of picking a pic from the gallery so that we can choose wallpapers supplied by custom launchers, etc. Also add a feature where the colours are automatically picked from the wallpaper.
title: Looks gorgeous but lacks some features

author: Brian Gilroy
comment: Great app but the time slows down after a while it was 20 mins off after a few hours
title: Great but needs work

author: David Brown
comment: This clock has the lots !!!! Live wallpaper, widget and a matching watch face! All fully adjustable in the settings. If want a clock on your home screen but not on the other screens it can be done! With awesome animations. Try it hand and you will not be disappointed!
title: The best clock EVER!!

author: Gifto Sojan
comment: Can u add a background pic rather than a white screen
title: It is amazing

author: psydex
comment: Drains batter A LOT; Phone doesn't go to sleep when set to live wallpaper.
title: Excellent with few kinks

author: Vladislav Kluska
comment: In some time live wallpaper switch to a random picture. Why? It makes it useless.
title: Live wallpaper work really weird

author: Sean Chai
comment: An option for date would be nice for both widget and wearable. A bit laggy on smw3 but loves it.
title: Date option

author: Morgan Lim
comment: App has many options, like pulling colours from your wallpaper. The clock can be used as a widget, an animated live wallpaper, and even an android wear watchface. Best of all, it's totally free, not even ads in the config app.
title: Love it

author: Alpha_omega_x
comment: Need support for Android N app crashes. But allows me to change my watch face settings. And not my widget.
title: Android 7.0

author: Harshal Gohel
comment: One feature request, to prevent screen burn please move clock randomly around the seen in daydream/screensaver

author: Abhishek Deshpande
comment: The best thing that ever happened to my homescreen. Awesome work!😃 👍👏👌
title: Best live wallpaper since mankind.

author: ayyy lmao
comment: One of the best live wallpaper I have used but eats up too much RAM I checked on my RAM and it eats up to 112mb therefore eating battery too, if it eats less in the near future that would be fantastic.

author: Purv Rane
comment: The custom image is not high resolution,even when I am choosing 4k image
title: Live wallpaper

author: Brandon Suydam
comment: Beautiful clock widget. Just a little laggy but great idea.
title: 👌
